# Datasets

The `harsat` package provides three standard datasets to help you 
get started. These aren't R data files, instead they are zip files
that contain everything you need for the analyses.

## HELCOM

* [Download the data](../helcom.zip)
* [Worked example](./example_HELCOM.html)

## OSPAR

* [Download the data](../ospar.zip)
* [Worked example](./example_OSPAR.html)

## AMAP (external)

* [Download the data](../external.zip)
* [Worked example](./example_external_data.html)
